remarks: Value of the first projection on an object.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1stfval.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
1stfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` T ) $.
1stfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` T ) $.
1stfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
1stfval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
2ndfval.p $e |- Q = ( C 2ndF D ) $.
2ndf1.p $e |- ( ph -> R e. B ) $.
2ndf1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` Q ) ` R ) = ( 2nd ` R ) ) $.
